description:
Zorin OS 17.3 distribution is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.8 from Ubuntu 24.04 LTS and featuring various UI enhancements, as well as updated components. Here’s what’s new!

The post Ubuntu-Based Zorin OS 17.3 Is Now Available Targeting Windows 10 Users appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Ubuntu-Based Zorin OS 17.3 Is Now Available Targeting Windows 10 Users
